# RunProgramOptions.UseShellExecute property

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the operating system shell will be used to start the process.

```csharp
public bool UseShellExecute { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

true if the shell should be used when starting the process; false if the process should be created directly from the executable file.
